data.name: Slot Factory Create and Play - Magic Brewery
data.detailed_description:
Update

Our next update coming soon, will allow saving many games to your hard drive. Players can simply start the game and load a created save game within game.


About the Game

Slot Factory Bigger, Better, Brighter, and easier to create and play. Ever wanted to create a slot game but did know how to program. ( Here is the next best thing. ) Pokies4fun have Licensed the game engine to Slot Factory to create a slot making game for the whole family. What make this release so special. All the graphics for each reel can be changed, and the background image for your theme. Plus in this new version ability to change sound and music and what makes this so exiting that users will be able to create their own games to share with others in the Slots of Fame section of our website, resale and other options. Got a Man Cave, now you can create a game to suit your style. With a little work from your graphics program eg. Paintshop or Adobe you can create a slot game for all to enjoy, even better you can place images directly from your hardive, like a special event, birthday, Fathersday etc...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 32 bit
  • Processor: Intel - Amd
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Standard Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All Standard Sound Cards
  • Additional Notes: For Amusement Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel - Amd
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Standard Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All Standard Sound Cards
  • Additional Notes: For Amusement Only
